message.content:
1. The Remifentanil group had a lower duration of procedure.
2. The duration of procedure in the Remifentanil group was 2.5 ± 1.6 minutes.
3. The duration of procedure in the comparison group was 4.6 ± 1.8 minutes.
4. The difference in duration of procedure between the two groups was statistically significant (p < 0.001).
5. The Remifentanil group had a higher pain reduction.
6. The pain reduction in the Remifentanil group was 53.7 ± 13.3.
7. The pain reduction in the comparison group was 33.5 ± 19.6.
8. The difference in pain reduction between the two groups was statistically significant (p < 0.001).
9. The Remifentanil group had a lower failure rate.
10. The failure rate in the Remifentanil group was 1 (2.1%).
11. The failure rate in the comparison group was 15 (31.3%).
12. The difference in failure rate between the two groups was statistically significant (p < 0.001).
13. The Remifentanil group had higher satisfaction.
14. The difference in satisfaction between the two groups was statistically significant (p = 0.005).

messages.content:
Statement: Remifentanil group had lower duration of procedure (2.5 ± 1.6 versus 4.6 ± 1.8 minutes, p < 0.001), higher pain reduction (53.7 ± 13.3 versus 33.5 ± 19.6, p < 0.001), lower failure rate (1 (2.1%) versus 15 (31.3%), p < 0.001), higher satisfaction (p = 0.005).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
